price: ߊ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߛߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߞߛߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߫ ߢߐ߲߬ߞߌ߲߬ߣߍ߲ ߕߏ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
